ValidationRule.description: The opportunity is frozen when the Projects on Hold field is true. Changes can be made by the Finance, Legal and Operations teams only.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Closed Won"), PRIORVALUE(Project_On_Hold__c) = TRUE, NOT(ISNEW()), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"[Bynder] Legal")), NOT($Profile.Name = "Automated Process"), NOT(OR( ISCHANGED(number_of_draft_Orders__c), ISCHANGED(of_Activated_Orders__c ), ISCHANGED(Link_to_Projects__c), ISCHANGED(Onboarding_Project_Manager_1__c), ISCHANGED(Onboarding_Project_Manager_2__c), ISCHANGED(Reason_for_delay__c), ISCHANGED(Customisation_Required__c), ISCHANGED(Notice_period_months__c))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only Finance, Legal and Operations can edit projects with implementation status "On-Hold". Please contact one of them to make changes.
